abstract.text: The core framework for Soto, a Swift SDK for AWS

inlineContent.text: SotoCore is the underlying driver for executing requests for the Soto Swift SDK for AWS. You will most likely be using this via one of libraries in
. Much of the public APIs here you will never need to know as they are used internally by the Soto service libraries. But there are a few objects that are used.
